node.description: Sometimes salvation comes from the unlikeliest places.  It was that way in Samaria in the days of Elisha.  Four lepers were used by God to bring salvation to a starving city. Why could God use them rather than the many mighty in the city? Discover how God wants us to be the World’s Richest Beggars still today!
